name: Lucina's Overflowing Life
body:
**Source** Paizo Gamemastery Guide pg. 102
-
Life force flows through you and Lucina, and positive energy causes your vital essence to burst through your skin like beads of liquid light. Lucina's Overflowing Life grants you an item bonus equal to half the relicâ€™s level (minimum 1) to the Hit Points you recover from positive healing spells; this bonus applies only the first time per casting that a particular spell heals you.
